MapÂ¶

Escher uses the same format as escher for the maps. Maps from escher can be imported using the Map button (web app) or with drag and drop (native app).

The only difference is that the histogram position (which does not exist in escher) can be exported to the map (only native app for now) using the Export drop down on the Settings window. This allows to save a map with the correct manually fixed positions where different data can be plotted for the same of different projects.

Shu
